summary: Completed comprehensive testing of role-based approval workflow for content versions. All features working correctly - Manager can create drafts but cannot approve (403), Owner can approve and rollback, Content Studio shows proper approval notes based on role, public preview works, and scheduled publishing stores scheduled_publish_at correctly.
passed_tests: Content Studio shows approval note for Manager role
Content Studio hides approval note for Owner role
Approve button disabled for Manager in UI
Approve button enabled for Owner in UI
Public preview works for authorized users
Version listing includes created_by_role and approved_by_role
Role-based permissions enforced in backend API
Frontend UI properly reflects user permissions
